skill.description:
Grants all allies **Regeneration** (250+25% HP for 3 turn, cap 1500, last 3 turns) and **increases Burst Point by 15**\
Upgrade: Also grants **35% Legato** (3 turns)
skill.name: 隠しメニュー (Hidden Menu)
スペシャルドリンク (Special Drink)
skill.description:
Grants an Earth ally **Special Made Drink**\
Enhance: Also grants **Pursuit,** all skill of target have **cooldown reduced by 1 turn**

effect.name: Special Made Drink
effect.description: Enhanced Attack Rate +25%, Defense +40%. Greatly increases Hate. Recovers HP at the end turn. (3 turns)

effect.name: Pursuit
effect.description: Increase damage by 280%, increase normal attack damage cap by 150% (1 turn)

resonance.description:
**Consumes 40% current HP of all all allies**, grants all allies **30% Enmity, 40% Water Defense Up** and **removes 2 debuff**

Upgrade: Grants all earth allies **25% chase damage**
resonance.name: 天華桜閃 (Midsummer Delivery)

passive.name: 真夏の特急配達 (Summer Express Delivery)
passive.description:
At the start of battle, grants all allies **10 Hype** (6 turns)\
Enhance: also grants **25% multi attack rate up** (6 turns)

passive.name: ご注文ありがとうございます (Thanks For Your Order!)
passive.description: At the end of turn, if Gaiyou was taken damaged this turn, gains **1 Defense Up stack**. Increases all Earth allies **Normal Attack Damage Cap**

passive.name: シンクロ加護 (Divine Protection of Synchronization)
passive.description: After using **Special Drink**, **fully charges target's Burst Point**
